remarks: Value of a lattice translation under its co-atom.  (Contributed by NM, 20-May-2012.)
statement:
ltrnval1.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
ltrnval1.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
ltrnval1.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
ltrnval1.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
ltrnval1 $p |- ( ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T /\ ( X e. B /\ X .<_ W ) ) -> ( F ` X ) = X ) $.
